decision_conditions: By way of its design, width and siting, the proposed part single/part two storey side extension would extend too close to the boundary line and two-storey dwelling at 7A Westminster Road. The addition of excessive side mass and bulk will create a terracing effect, out of character with the rest of the area. It would result in the loss of the spatial gap between the two properties, which are of differing architectural typologies. The proposal would accordingly result in harm to the character, appearance and visual amenity of the surrounding area and the street scene. The application therefore fails to comply with Policies D4 and D5 of the London Plan (2021), Policies 7.4 and 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013) and Stage B: Design Guidance of the Ealing Housing Design Guidance (2022).
description: Part single, part two storey side extension (following demolition of existing garage)
